item.title: Hida add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Hida add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Hida add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Hida add a quote by Orson Welles
item.description: "You know what the fellow said – in Italy, for thirty years under the Borgias, they had warfare, terror, murder and bloodshed, but they produced Michelangelo, Leonardo da Vinci and the Renaissance. In Switzerland, they had brotherly love, they had five hundred years of democracy and peace – and what did that produce? The cuckoo clock." -- Orson Welles

item.title: Hida add a quote by Douglas MacArthur
item.description: "Whoever said the pen is mightier than the sword obviously never encountered automatic weapons." -- Douglas MacArthur

item.title: Hida add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The truth is, every son raised by a single mom is pretty much born married. I don't know, but until your mom dies it seems like all the other women in your life can never be more than just your mistress." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Hida add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Hida add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Hida add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "In politics, If you want anything said, ask a man. If you want anything done, ask a woman." -- Margaret Thatcher

item.title: Hida add a quote by Erma Bombeck
Hida add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "We still think of a powerful man as a born leader and a powerful woman as an anomaly." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Hida add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Hida add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Hida add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Never memorize something that you can look up." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Hida add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi
